item.title: When Sharmila Tagore spoke about converting to Islam when she married Tiger Pataudi: 'You couldn't be fli - TOI Etimes
item.description:
When Sharmila Tagore spoke about converting to Islam when she married Tiger Pataudi: 'You couldn't be flippant...'

Published on: N/A Source: Times of India

Sharmila Tagore shares her personal journey of converting to Islam upon marrying Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi, emphasizing the challenges faced in their interfaith union.

  • Sharmila converted to Islam to marry Tiger Pataudi, revealing the complexities involved.
  • She expressed that the conversion was neither easy nor hard, and one had to face it sincerely.
  • Sharmila learned more about both Hinduism and Islam after her conversion.
  • She shared her first meeting with her mother-in-law and the respectful bond they formed.
  • Despite receiving death threats during their wedding preparations, the ceremony went smoothly.
“In Kolkata, when I was getting married, my parents were getting telegrams saying that bullets shall speak... despite the tension, the wedding and reception went smoothly.” - Sharmila Tagore

This personal account highlights the societal pressures and deep commitment within their interfaith marriage.

item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 5: Sonu Sood Starrer Sees Growth; Actor Declares Film a HIT

The film 'Fateh' featuring Sonu Sood has shown significant growth at the box office, earning Rs 12 crore on its fifth day of release, leading the actor to declare it a HIT.

“The audience has truly embraced Fateh, and it reflects in the box office numbers” - Sonu Sood.

The success of 'Fateh' shows the potential for Indian cinema to resonate well with the audience, especially when backed by strong performances and engaging storytelling.

item.title: Shakti Kapoor reveals he begged wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up promising film career, marry him: ‘Be a housewife’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shakti Kapoor ‘begged’ wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up a promising film career to marry him: ‘I apologised and said…’

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Bollywood actor Shakti Kapoor opens up about his relationship with wife Shivangi Kolhapure, detailing how their love story began and the sacrifices she made for him.

  • Shakti Kapoor and Shivangi Kolhapure have been married for 43 years.
  • Shivangi left a promising career in acting and singing to marry Shakti, despite family opposition.
  • The couple eloped in 1982 and later reconciled with their families.
  • They have two children, including actress Shraddha Kapoor.
“I went to her and begged her. I apologized and told her I wanted to marry her... She gave up her singing career and everything else for me.” - Shakti Kapoor

This heartfelt revelation highlights the deep bond and sacrifices made in their relationship, showcasing a love that has stood the test of time.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 5: Ram Charan Is Only 41 Crore Away To Deliver Highest-Grossing Solo Film Of His Career! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 5: Ram Charan Is Only 41 Crore Away To Deliver Highest-Grossing Solo Film

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan’s Game Changer is performing well at the box office, accumulating 112.84 crore in five days, with hope rising thanks to a favorable holiday.

  • The film opened with 54 crore and grossed 94.8 crore over the opening weekend.
  • On Day 5, it earned approximately 10.19 crore, a jump of 29% from the previous day.
  • Total estimated collection stands at 112.84 crore, making it Ram Charan's 2nd highest-grossing solo film.
“Game Changer is now only 41 crore away from surpassing Rangasthalam, which earned 154 crore.”

Despite market dynamics, the film is recognized for having the largest Sankranti opening.

item.title: Coldplay India Concert: Traffic Restrictions Imposed In Navi Mumbai You Must Know - News18
item.description:
Coldplay India Concert: Traffic Restrictions Imposed In Navi Mumbai You Must Know

Last Updated: January 15, 2025, 14:35 IST

Days ahead of Coldplay’s mega show in Navi Mumbai, traffic restrictions have been imposed in the city to ensure safe and smooth movement during the concert at Dr D.Y. Patil Stadium on January 18, 19, and 21.

  • Traffic restrictions will be in effect from 2 PM to 12 AM on concert days.
  • Heavy vehicles are banned from entering, travelling, or parking on roads within the Navi Mumbai Police Commissionerate jurisdiction.
  • Essential goods vehicles, fire brigades, ambulances, and government vehicles are exempt.
  • Commuters are advised to plan routes ahead and avoid roads near the stadium during restricted hours.
  • This marks Coldplay’s first performance in India since 2016, with an additional show scheduled due to high demand.
“Commuters are advised to plan their routes accordingly on the concert dates and avoid roads near the stadium during the restricted hours,” said DCP Kakade.

This concert series is highly anticipated and follows Coldplay's last visit to India in 2016, ensuring significant public attention and excitement.

item.title: Dhanashree Verma makes first appearance amid divorce rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal, she requests paps to... - DNA India
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma's First Public Appearance Amid Divorce Rumors with Yuzvendra Chahal

Publication Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: DNA India

Choreographer Dhanashree Verma, who has been in the spotlight over divorce rumors with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal, made her first public appearance recently, interacting with paparazzi in Mumbai.

  • Dhanashree was papped while stepping out of her car at the T-Series office.
  • She wore a chic black bodycon skirt with a white shirt and stylish black sunglasses.
  • During the interaction, she requested paps to stop filming her, saying, “Bas na (Stop).”
  • Netizens had mixed reactions to her appearance and comments made by the paparazzi.
  • The couple tied the knot in 2020, but rumors of a split have begun to circulate in 2023.
“The past few days have been incredibly tough for my family and me... It takes courage and compassion to uplift others. I choose to focus on my truth and move forward.” - Dhanashree Verma

Dhanashree is challenging the negativity online, asserting her integrity while navigating the ongoing rumors surrounding her marriage.

item.title: Author Neil Gaiman denies sexual assault allegations made by 8 women, admits he's ‘far from a perfect person’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Neil Gaiman Denies Sexual Assault Allegations by Eight Women

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Neil Gaiman has responded to recent allegations of sexual misconduct made by eight women, asserting that he has never engaged in non-consensual activity. He expressed his dismay over the accusations and acknowledged his imperfections.

  • Gaiman denies all allegations of sexual misconduct and asserts he has never engaged in non-consensual sexual activity.
  • The allegations include claims of a sexual assault occurring in a bath and participation in BDSM activities.
  • Gaiman admits to being careless with people's feelings and acknowledges the need for personal growth.
  • Some allegations were labeled by Gaiman as distorted or fabricated, but he takes responsibility for any missteps.
  • The accusations have impacted adaptations of his works, including the series Good Omens.
“I’ve never engaged in non-consensual sexual activity with anyone. Ever.” - Neil Gaiman

The situation highlights a complex balancing act between personal and public narratives, with Gaiman committing to making amends and transforming his actions.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj box office collection day 3: Nandamuri Balakrishna, Bobby Deol film enters ₹50 crore club in India - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 3

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Daaku Maharaaj, featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna and Bobby Deol, has performed exceptionally well at the box office, crossing ₹50 crore in just three days post-release.

  • The film earned ₹12 crore on its third day, totaling ₹50.15 crore nationally.
  • Opened with ₹25.35 crore on day one and ₹12.8 crore on day two.
  • Worldwide gross reached ₹74 crore within two days.
  • Mixed reviews but considerable audience and box office success.
“The ultimate SANKRANTHI BLOCKBUSTER is winning hearts worldwide!”

The film’s strong opening and box office performance reflect significant interest and engagement from audiences, marking a successful debut for Bobby Deol in Telugu cinema.

item.title: Priyanka Chopra aces her business-girl chic era in stylish blouse, bodycon satin skirt on set of Jonas Brothers' film - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Embraces Business-Girl Chic on Jonas Brothers' Film Set

Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Priyanka Chopra was spotted on the set of the Jonas Brothers' holiday film, showcasing a stylish business-girl chic look with her outfit.

  • Priyanka wore a white knit blouse with a plunging V neckline and snug fit.
  • Her striking satin skirt was cherry red, featuring a high-rise waist and midi hem length.
  • She accessorized with a tan tote bag, a lavender pouch, and elegant jewelry.
  • Priyanka is also starring in several upcoming international projects.
“Priyanka is in her business girl chic era.”

This appearance highlights Priyanka Chopra's evolving fashion sense as she continues to balance work and style on international film sets.

item.title: Bobby Deol impresses Telugu fans with Daaku Maharaaj - 123telugu
item.description:
Bobby Deol Impresses Telugu Fans with Daaku Maharaaj

Published on Jan 15, 2025 8:00 am IST

Bollywood star Bobby Deol has captured the hearts of Telugu movie lovers with his impressive performance in the recently released film, Daaku Maharaaj, directed by Bobby Kolli.

  • Bobby Deol plays the role of Balwant Singh Thakur, a notorious dacoit.
  • His performance is marked by depth, authenticity, and intensity, resonating well with the audience.
  • Daaku Maharaaj has been a significant success, further solidifying Bobby's reputation in the Telugu film industry.
  • Upcoming projects include Bollywood film Alpha, Thalapathy69 with Vijay, and an untitled project with Anurag Kashyap.
“The way the Bollywood actor added depth and authenticity to his character... has struck a chord with the Telugu audience.”

Bobby Deol continues to establish himself as a versatile actor, promising exciting upcoming projects that will keep his fans engaged.

item.title: Justin Baldoni sends Disney and Marvel legal notice over Ryan Reynolds' Nicepool character amid Blake Liv - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Justin Baldoni Sends Legal Notice to Disney and Marvel Over Nicepool Character

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Actor Justin Baldoni has issued a legal notice to Disney and Marvel regarding the portrayal of a character named Nicepool, linked to a dispute involving Blake Lively.

  • Baldoni's concerns center on the character's similarities to existing media.
  • The legal action highlights possible intellectual property issues in the entertainment industry.
  • The notice follows a public backlash regarding the character's representation.

“This could have serious implications for how characters are created and represented.”

This situation underscores the increasing attention being given to character rights in film and television as creators assert ownership over their works.

item.title: Marco star Unni Mukundan reacts to contrasting audience reactions, says he's sure film won't do good on an OTT platform - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Unni Mukundan Addresses Audience Reactions to 'Marco' and Its OTT Future

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film 'Marco' starring Unni Mukundan has generated mixed reactions regarding its portrayal of violence. In a recent interview, Mukundan discussed his thoughts on audience responses and expressed skepticism about the film's success on OTT platforms.

  • Unni Mukundan, who produced and stars in 'Marco', acknowledges mixed audience reactions.
  • He believes that disturbing content is a part of entertainment, especially in a theatrical setting.
  • Mukundan doubts the film's potential success on OTT, stating that some films are designed for the theater experience.
  • 'Marco' is considered one of the most violent Indian films, released on December 20, 2024.
“I don't think Marco will do any good on the OTT platform. I already feel that. I am going to get ripped off most probably on the logic part… because a certain kind of cinema is designed for the theatres.”

Overall, Mukundan emphasizes the importance of the theatrical experience and the intelligence of the audience in processing violent themes in cinema.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 15, 2025 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 15, 2025

Publication Date: January 15, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope offers insights into the love and relationship dynamics for each zodiac sign on January 15, 2025. It emphasizes understanding, patience, and communication to strengthen bonds.

  • Aries: Focus on supporting loved ones and understanding the deeper aspects of love.
  • Taurus: Avoid temptation; loyalty is key to harmony in relationships.
  • Gemini: Encourage open communication to enhance intimacy.
  • Cancer: Show care through attentive listening to strengthen bonds.
  • Leo: Concentrate on nurturing your relationship without worrying about the future.
  • Virgo: Self-improvement is vital; take time for self-reflection.
  • Libra: Express affection in simple, meaningful ways.
  • Scorpio: Engage in deeper conversations for improved closeness.
  • Sagittarius: Handle minor conflicts thoughtfully to ensure loyalty.
  • Capricorn: Be brave in expressing your feelings to strengthen intimacy.
  • Aquarius: Introduce small acts of kindness to rekindle excitement.
  • Pisces: Reflect on your relationship before pursuing new interests.
“Love grows when talking and working with one another.”

This horoscope highlights the importance of nurturing love through understanding and communication, providing guidance for healthier relationships moving forward.
